original_title: Damith Pallewatte to take over as next CEO of Sri Lanka’s Hatton National Bank
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Damith Pallewatte will be appointed as the next Managing Director/ Chief Executive Officer of Hatton National Bank, a statement said.
The veteran banker will succeed Jonathan Alles, who is retiring from August 23,2024, a statement from the bank said.

Pallewatte, who is currently serving as the Deputy General manager of Wholesale Banking Group of HNB, has over 27 years of experience in the sector of which over 14 years in senior/ corporate management.
The appointment will be effective from August 24,2024 with the retirement of Jonathan Alles. (Colombo/ May 28/2023)
